attributes.action: take steps to discourage in the media and public life the misuse as swear-words of the word "God", the words "Jesus" and "Christ" in the Christian religion, and similar terms in other religions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The misuse of the word "God", and the names "Jesus" and "Christ" is upsetting to Christians, as the misuse of similar names in other religions is upsetting to followers of other religions. 
In seeking to reduce religious tension, it would help if the Prime Minister and the Government could give an active lead to the country so that, just as racial abuse is not acceptable, religious abuse is not encouraged through the misuse of religious terms.  To refuse to discourage the misuse of these words is by default effectively to encourage/permit religious abuse.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
